title: Nekollection Manga Reader 3.12 build 4519
description:
Nekollection is a fast, light yet powerful Manga / Comics reader.
Note: No manga included ! You have to provide your own as .ZIP / .CBZ files.
Features:
- Simple, ergonomic user interface. Hardware accelerated !
- Highly optimized for a wide variety of devices and screens. From the smallest smartphone to the largest tablet.
- Support for archives (ZIP, CBZ) and image folders (PNG, JPG, GIF, BMP).
- Navigate inside your device storage with animated collection previews. Organize your collections easily using folders !
- Quickly display your last viewed collections. Nekollection remembers the last viewed page automatically !
- Set your favorite collections for easy retrieval.
- Many configuration options are available to adapt it to your device and needs (reading direction, orientation lock, ...).
- Features an exclusive sample Manga, please check it out !
